metrics.name: Accepted usage decisions rate
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
 WHERE
 (SELECT COUNT(event_name) WHERE ("UD Code"='A')) > 0
	 AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')
)/
 COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	 WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision'))*100

metrics.name: Result recording cycle time
metrics.description: Time from begin to complete result recording
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Complete Result Recording'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name='Begin Result Recording'))
	)

metrics.name: Cases with free and restricted material movement
metrics.description: Number of cases with both free and restricted material movement
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Material Movement Free')
 AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Material Movement Restricted'))

metrics.name: Result recording to usage decision lead time
metrics.description: Time from complete result recording to create usage decision
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name='Create Usage Decision'))
	-
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name = 'Complete Result Recording'))
	)

metrics.name: Free material movement rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with free material movement
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name IN ('Material Movement Free')
 )
/
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'
)
*100

metrics.name: Rejected usage decisions rate
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
 WHERE
(SELECT COUNT(event_name) WHERE ("UD Code" = 'R')) > 0
	 AND event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision')
) /
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	 WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create Usage Decision'))*100

metrics.name: Restricted material movement rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with restricted material movement
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name IN ('Material Movement Restricted')
 )
 /
COUNT (event_name) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'
)
*100

metrics.name: Automation rate material movement
metrics.description: Percentage of automated material movement events
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT
	COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ((${itq_automation_condition})
		AND event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'
	)))) / 
SUM((SELECT
	COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)
		AND event_name ILIKE 'Material Movement%'))
) * 100

metrics.name: Automation rate usage decision
metrics.description: Percentage of automated usage decision creation events
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE (${itq_automation_condition})
	)))
/ 
SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IS NOT NULL)))
) * 100

metrics.name: Delayed inspections rate
metrics.description: Percentage inspection with planned inspection end date before usage decision date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
 WHERE ("Planned Inspection End Date"<
			(SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision'))
			)))
 	/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE event_name MATCHES('Create Usage Decision'))*100

metrics.name: Number of delayed inspections
metrics.description: Number of cases where create usage decision accrued after the planned inspection end date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
WHERE ("Planned Inspection End Date"<
	  (SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision')))))

metrics.name: Average cycle time of delayed inspections
metrics.description: Average cycle time of cases where usage decision accrued after the planned Inspection end date
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
		(SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
 		 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision')))
			-"Planned Inspection End Date"
	) FILTER(
	  		WHERE("Planned Inspection End Date"<
				(SELECT LAST(END_TIME) FILTER (
 		WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Usage Decision'))
	)))

variables.name: itq_automation_condition
variables.description: User type indicating that an event is performed automatically and not by an employee, for example 'System'
